subject: Add `__fixtures__` exclusion to jest.base.ts template and root
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Add `"!**/__fixtures__/**"` to the `defaultCoverageExclusions` array in both `typescript/copy-overwrite/jest.base.ts` (template) and `jest.base.ts` (root). Insert after `!**/__mocks__/**`, before `!**/components/ui/**`. Also add a test assertion in `tests/unit/config/jest-base.test.ts`.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `typescript/copy-overwrite/jest.base.ts` has `"!**/__fixtures__/**"` in `defaultCoverageExclusions`
- [ ] `jest.base.ts` (root) has `"!**/__fixtures__/**"` in `defaultCoverageExclusions`
- [ ] `tests/unit/config/jest-base.test.ts` has assertion for `__fixtures__` exclusion
- [ ] Tests pass

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`

**Implementation Details:**
- Files to modify: `typescript/copy-overwrite/jest.base.ts`, `jest.base.ts`, `tests/unit/config/jest-base.test.ts`
- Add after `"!**/__mocks__/**"` line, before `"!**/components/ui/**"` line

**Testing Requirements:** `bun test -- tests/unit/config/jest-base.test.ts`

**Verification:**
- Type: test
- Command: `bun test -- tests/unit/config/jest-base.test.ts`
- Expected: All tests pass including the new `__fixtures__` assertion
